headline: Web outages possibly linked to the Ukraine invasion
description:
I just wanted to check flightradar24.com - but no luck. Then went on to find other live map services and liveuamap.com also seems to be down.
I'm wondering, could these be related to what's going on in Ukraine? Have you encountered other outages that could be connected? These are not the official government sites that were reported to be attacked some hours ago, but live information sites with probably valuable information for civilians. Liveradar24 is not a military intelligence site, but some MIL transponder codes were tracked on there, as well. This the last archive.org snapshot of liveuamap: https://web.archive.org/web/20220223210344/https://liveuamap.com/
headline_zh-Hans: 网络中断可能与乌克兰入侵有关
headline_zh-Hant: 網絡中斷可能與烏克蘭入侵有關
description_zh-Hans:
我只是想检查一下flightradar24.com - 但没有找到。然后继续寻找其他实时地图服务，liveuamap.com似乎也被关闭了。
我在想，这些是否与乌克兰发生的事情有关？你是否遇到过其他可能有关联的故障？这些不是几个小时前报道的被攻击的官方政府网站，而是可能对平民有价值信息的实时信息网站。Liveradar24不是一个军事情报网站，但那里也跟踪了一些军用转发器代码。这是liveuamap的最后一个archive.org快照：https://web.archive.org/web/20220223210344/https://liveuamap.com/
description_zh-Hant:
我只是想檢查一下flightradar24.com - 但沒有找到。然後繼續尋找其他實時地圖服務，liveuamap.com似乎也被關閉了。
我在想，這些是否與烏克蘭發生的事情有關？你是否遇到過其他可能有關聯的故障？這些不是幾個小時前報道的被攻擊的官方政府網站，而是可能對平民有價值信息的實時信息網站。Liveradar24不是一個軍事情報網站，但那裡也跟蹤了一些軍用轉發器代碼。這是liveuamap的最後一個archive.org快照：https://web.archive.org/web/20220223210344/https://liveuamap.com/
